sentences.en: Boys used to play at cowboys and Indians.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们过去常玩牛仔和印第安人的游戏。

sentences.en: Fortunately, such cowboy firms are becoming rarer.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，这样的欺诈公司越来越少了。

sentences.en: He had sought work as a cowboy, rounding up cattle.
sentences.cn: 他找了一份放牛的差事，负责把牛赶到一起。

sentences.en: He loved to see cowboy movies.
He traded a job in New York City for the life of a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了在纽约的工作,去过牛仔生活.

sentences.en: He wore frayed jeans and cowboy shirts.
sentences.cn: 他穿着磨破的牛仔裤和牛仔衬衫。

sentences.en: I felt sure I had all the skills to be a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 我确信自己具备当牛仔的一切本领.

sentences.en: I woke up in Hoboken wearing nothing but a poncho and a cowboy hat.
sentences.cn: 在赫伯肯醒来时只穿了斗篷和牛仔帽(纽约市一地方 )

sentences.en: In his last film he starred as a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 他在其最后一部影片中担任主角,扮演一位牛仔.

sentences.en: In other words, the logical extension of Leatherstocking is the cowboy - hero in his novel.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 皮袜子必然演变为他小说里的牛仔英雄.

sentences.en: That horse was wild, but the cowboy broke it in.
sentences.cn: 那匹马很狂野, 但是却被这个牛仔驯服了.

sentences.en: The cowboy broke the unruly horse.
The cowboy splashed his way across the shallow stream with his cow.

sentences.cn: 牛仔已经穿扎停当,准备上马了.

sentences.en: What is it that keeps a cowboy looking strong, young and ready for another roundup?
sentences.cn: 是什么使牛仔总是看起来强壮又年轻，而且随时能够把牛赶到一起？

sentences.en: You're sending me into an lndian casino dressed like a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 你让我打扮成牛仔进入印第安赌场?
